resources.string: Cats are the born masters of disguise! Do you want to take a hint for 10 points? You have %d
Cats are the born masters of disguise! Do you want to look at the hint again?

Thank you for choosing our application! As a token of our gratitude do give you 100 points, which can be spent on hints. As already mentioned, our application will not contain in-game purchases! Obtain points can only be fair game. :) Read more in the section Information.
"Oops, it seems the cats are over. Good job"
This game does not collect or use your personal data, but our partners (such as Google or Yandex) can collect certain impersonal information. For more details you can read our privacy policy.

"The goal of the game is to find the cat as soon as possible and touch it muzzle. It's fun!
Bonus points that can be spent on hints are credited for each cat, found without a hint."

"Cats are over.
You had to perform %d clicks on the screen to find all masters of disguise.
You can reset the progress by clicking the Reset button bellow and look for cats again! Have fun!"
Success! You can find cats again.
We love cats and hope you will enjoy our game :)
Please allow the game to access the memory of your device! Without this, we will not be able to attach a card of achievement!
This action will reset the whole game progress. Do you want to continue?
I got an achievement \"%s\" in the game Find the Cat! Join now!
I like to search the cats in the game Find a cat for Android! #FindACat
